classes.name: SOAPAuthentication
classes.description: Represents authentication information for a SOAP host.

methods.name: getRawAuthProperty
methods.description: Gets the specified authentication attribute.

methods.name: getSOAPAuthentications
methods.description: Returns all the available authentication types.

methods.name: getSessionModes
methods.description: Returns the supported session modes.

methods.name: createAuthentication
methods.description: Creates an authentication instance.

classes.name: SOAPDynamicInParameter
classes.description: Represents a dynamic input parameter object to be used from scripting.

classes.name: SOAPDynamicOutParameter
classes.description: Represents a dynamic output parameter object to be used from scripting.

classes.name: SOAPHost
classes.description: Represents an external system as its Web Service interface.

attributes.name: preferredEndpointURL
attributes.description: Preferred endpoint address. If set will be used with higher priority than the endpoint address defined within the WSDL.

attributes.name: wsdlUri
attributes.description: URI to the WSDL file of the external service

attributes.name: wsdlLocal
attributes.description: True if the WSDL content is locally provided, false if it is derived from URL

methods.name: getOperation
methods.description: Gets a SOAP operation by name.

methods.name: getOperations
methods.description: Gets all the SOAP operation names.

methods.name: createWorkflow
methods.description: Creates a new workflow for a SOAP operation.
methods.parameters: operationName: String, workflowName: String, category: WorkflowCategory, options: Properties

classes.name: SOAPHostManager
classes.description: Provides CRUD operations for SOAP hosts.

methods.name: addHost
methods.description: Adds a SOAP host to the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: updateHost
methods.description: Updates the specified SOAP host in the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: removeHost
methods.description: Removes a SOAP host from the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: getHosts
methods.description: Returns the list of SOAP host ids from the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: getHost
methods.description: Returns the SOAP host with the specified name from the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: reloadConfiguration
methods.description: Reloads the plug-in configuration.

classes.name: SOAPInterceptor
classes.description: Holds javascript handler functions that intercept the SOAP requests and SOAP responses.

methods.name: setRequestHeaderInterceptor
methods.description: Sets a handler function to intercept the SOAP request header.

methods.name: setRequestBodyInterceptor
methods.description: Sets a handler function to intercept the SOAP request body.

methods.name: setResponseHeaderInterceptor
methods.description: Sets a handler function to intercept the SOAP response header.

methods.name: setResponseBodyInterceptor
methods.description: Sets a handler function to intercept the SOAP response body.

classes.name: SOAPOperation
classes.description: Represents a SOAP operation template generated from WSDL definition.

methods.name: getHost
methods.description: Gets the parent SOAP host of the SOAP operation.

methods.name: getInHeaders
methods.description: Gets a flat representation of the SOAP operation's input headers.

methods.name: getInParameters
methods.description: Gets a flat representation of the SOAP operation's input parameters.

methods.name: getOutParameters
methods.description: Gets a flat representation of the SOAP operation's output parameters.

methods.name: createSOAPRequest
methods.description: Creates a new SOAP request for the SOAP operation.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Invokes the SOAP operation.

methods.name: invokeWithInterceptor
methods.description: Invokes the SOAP operation with message interceptor.

classes.name: SOAPRequest
classes.description: Represents a SOAP request to pass when a SOAP operation is invoked.

methods.name: setInParameter
methods.description: Sets an input parameter in the request.

methods.name: addInParameterAttribute
methods.description: Adds an attribute to the input parameter in the request.
methods.parameters: parameterName: String, attributeName: String, attributeValue: Any

methods.name: addRawHeader
methods.description: Adds an raw XML header to the request.

methods.name: setInHeader
methods.description: Sets an input header in the request.

methods.name: addInHeaderAttribute
methods.description: Adds an attribute to the input header.
methods.parameters: headerName: String, attributeName: String, attributeValue: Any

methods.name: setHttpHeader
methods.description: Adds a single HTTP header to the SOAP request. Any already existing HTTP header that has the same key will be overwritten.

methods.name: setHttpHeaders
methods.description: Adds HTTP headers to the SOAP request. All already existing HTTP headers that have the same keys will be overwritten.

classes.name: SOAPResponse
classes.description: Represents a SOAP response received when a SOAP operation is invoked.

methods.name: getOutParameters
methods.description: Gets the full names of all output parameters.

methods.name: getOutParameter
methods.description: Gets an output parameter value from the response.

methods.name: getOutParameterAttributes
methods.description: Gets the attribute names from the given output parameter.

methods.name: getOutParameterAttribute
methods.description: Gets the attribute value from the given output parameter and attribute name.

methods.name: getOutHeaders
methods.description: Gets the full names of all output headers.

methods.name: getOutHeader
methods.description: Gets an output header value from the response.

methods.name: getOutHeaderAttributes
methods.description: Gets the attribute names from the given output header.

methods.name: getOutHeaderAttribute
methods.description: Gets the attribute value from the given output header and attribute name.
